metadata.title: CVE-2018-10801 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
TIFFClientOpen in tif_unix.c in LibTIFF 3.8.2 has memory leaks, asdemonstrated by bmp2tiff.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10801` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5').
